law.text: The secretary, with the approval of the Governor, shall appoint necessary deputies, attorneys, statisticians, inspectors and other employees and fix their salaries according to law. These employees shall receive their actual necessary expenses.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1702, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 35, effective June 20, 2005. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1599c-6, 4767a-3.
